titleStmt.title: Ephraim L. Van Winkle et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG0889

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: Thomas E Bramlette, the undersigned would respectfully but earnestly urge the appointment of Col James T Bramlette to the office of Inspector Genl, of Ky, to fill the vacancy occasioned by the resignation of Col W H Hays.

We are induced to ask this action upon your part, from Our Knowledge of his fitness for the position and his meritorious services in behalf of his country during the Civil war just closed in which he acquitted himself with credit and honor as Lt Col of 12th Ky Cavalry Vol, c, =

E L Van Winkle --
secty of state
W T Scott. P M G
S. G. Suddarth
Q. M. Genl
W. H. Hays
Ins Genl Ky
D. W. Lindsey
Adjutant Genl Ky

Inspector General
Jas T. Bramlette
apptd
13th Nov 1865
